node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `approval` ( `approved_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `user_approved` int(11) default NULL, `whenapproved` timestamp NOT NULL default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP on update CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `status` varchar(4) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`approved_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: approval
